Package gui

Class SpriteAnimation

java.lang.Object
javafx.animation.Animation
javafx.animation.Transition
gui.SpriteAnimation
public class SpriteAnimation extends javafx.animation.Transition
SpriteAnimation extends Transition class is used to make something moving with its own time.
Author:
Mos

  • Constructor Details

    • SpriteAnimation

      public SpriteAnimation​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, javafx.util.Duration duration, int count, int columns, int offsetX, int offsetY, int width, int height)
      Constructor for SpriteAnimation class, we need to call this constructor and put the ImageView object that we want to make it move.
      Parameters:
      imageView - SpriteAnimation's image
      duration - time duration
      count - count
      columns - columns in sprite picture
      offsetX - horizontal offset
      offsetY - vertical offset
      width - player's width
      height - player's height
